sentences: Alterhaug was born in Mo i Rana, Norway.
He is one of the grand masters among European bassplayers and has been leading an international career in jazz since the late 1960s.

He continues to lead his post as a professor at the Institute of Music at Norges Teknisk-Naturvitenskapelige Universitet in Trondheim, Norway and has taught on the Jazz programme there since the start in 1979.
